description.narrative: Interested private sector organizations approach and actively involve WWS in their efforts to set up partnerships with WF & WRO. Interviews about working in cross-sector partnerships, the added value of WWS and feedback on how to improve program activities.

activity-date.narrative: Date that we finalise all monitoring and evaluation activities for the bootcamp
Date that we started logistics and planning for the bootcamp.

recipient-country.narrative: The bootcamp has taken place in The Netherlands, and participants came from several different countries in Asia, Africa and Latin-America.

sector.narrative: Participants were representing women's funds and women's rights organizations
